snippet: Spanning the globe, play in the Davis Cup World Group begins Friday. An understrength United States team has to defeat a Swiss squad led by Roger Federer.
lead_paragraph: Spanning the globe, play in the Davis Cup World Group begins Friday. An understrength United States team has to defeat a Swiss squad led by Roger Federer.

headline.seo: Djokovic and Nadal Are Spectators in Chief as Davis Cup Begins
headline.main: Djokovic and Nadal Are Spectators-in-Chief as Davis Cup Begins
headline.print_headline: Djokovic and Nadal Are Spectators-in-Chief as Davis Cup Begins
